name: sumZ+
description:
Come play sumZ+ -- a newly released, extremely satisfying and addicting, free puzzle game!

The game is simple. Connect like numbers in any direction and create their sum. The more you connect, the higher score you get. The higher numbers you make, the longer you'll last! Once you run out of moves, it’s game over! But you can always play again…

Sit back, relax, and enjoy making sumz!
